list.name: Sharpy
list.query: SELECT title,description from events WHERE $timeFilter order by time asc

targets.query: SELECT max("value") FROM "global" WHERE ("CATEGORY" = 'BusinessTimersContinuous' AND "type" = '95thPercentile' AND "NAME" = 'pain1-pacs8-to-csm') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "NAME" fill(null)

SELECT max("value") FROM "global" WHERE ("CATEGORY" = 'BusinessTimersContinuous' AND "type" = '95thPercentile' AND "NAME" = 'pain1-pacs8-to-csm') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "NAME" fill(null)

SELECT max("value") FROM "global" WHERE ("CATEGORY" = 'BusinessTimersContinuous' AND "type" = '95thPercentile' AND "NAME" = 'pain1-pacs8-to-csm') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "NAME" fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "global" WHERE ("CATEGORY" = 'BusinessTimersContinuous' AND "type" = 'min' AND "NAME" = 'pain1-pacs8-to-csm') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "NAME" fill(null)

SELECT max("value") FROM "global" WHERE (("PACKAGE" = 'com.clear2pay.bph.opfcommon.parsing' OR "PACKAGE" = 'com.clear2pay.bph.opfpayment.xmlmapper.parser' OR "PACKAGE" = 'com.clear2pay.bph.opfpayment.parsing.xml') AND  "metrictype" = 'timer' AND "type" = '95thPercentile' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "NAME" fill(null)
SELECT percentile("duration", 95)  / 1000000 FROM "autogen"."opf_cloud" WHERE ("component" = 'Parser' AND "metrictype" = 'TIMER') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT percentile("duration", 95)  / 1000000 FROM "autogen"."opf_cloud" WHERE ("component" = 'Formatter') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "global" WHERE ("NAME" =~ /.*findBy.*/ AND "type" = 'count') AND value > 0  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "NAME" fill(null)
SELECT max("count") FROM "opf_cloud" WHERE ("category" = 'afterWarmup') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "class" fill(null)
